message.body: Please tell me you've seen episode 6 of Newsroom....wow
Not yet. Hoping to watch it tonight
let me know what you think
Jeez, could they have crammed anything else in there?! Not even sure where to start
It was. Although they still gave Will the last word against the Santorum guy, which kind of bugged me even if it cut both ways.
Yes but I think that was to further emphasize the fact that he was being a bully. So even when he was beaten he still had to get the last word in
Yeah, I'm kind of hoping for some character growth on that front in the future ;-) Also I love the shrink even though I can't look at him without thinking of Harold& Kumar. Ha ha
Haha yeah I was thinking the same thing all I could see was a jewish pothead
I just realized what I liked best about it. It was the episode with the least Maggie, Don and Jim bs. Ha ha
